name: Rajesh Agrawal
text: St. Agrasen has provided excellent education to my child. The teachers are dedicated and the KECT management ensures quality education at affordable fees.

name: Priya Mehta
text: The Commerce stream here is outstanding. My daughter secured admission in top colleges thanks to the excellent coaching and guidance from AGI faculty.

name: Amit Patil
text: Being in Kalwa East, this school is easily accessible and provides world-class facilities. The holistic development approach is commendable.

name: Sunita Desai
text: The Science stream preparation is excellent. My son is well-prepared for engineering entrance exams. Thank you KECT and St. Agrasen!

name: Vikram Shah
text: The values and discipline taught here along with quality education make St. Agrasen the best choice in Thane. Proud to be part of this institution.
